name: Bump N' Grind
description:
Defend yourself from alien attackers by slamming your one-room spaceship into them as hard as you can!

this is a simple infinite wave-based game, see how far you can go

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move your character and aim dashes

Spacebar: Press while on the ground or on a wall to Jump, Press while in the air to Dash, Dashes can be aimed in any direction

Dash into the walls of your ship to bump it into enemies
